overview: Before co-founding CustomMade Ventures Corp with Seth Rosen, Mike Salguero worked for JPI, developing numerous multi-unit projects in the Boston area. Mikeâ€™s background includes acquisitions, contract negotiations, and project management. Mike has a strong entrepreneurial background, and has been a part of numerous start ups. CustomMade.com provides an online marketplace marrying custom artisans to independent consumers, and is working towards developing other verticals based on this model.
